BonusSpellFeature.Name: Ring of Telekinesis
BonusSpellFeature.Text: While wearing this ring, you can cast the telekinesis spell at will, but you can target only objects that aren't being worn or carried.

MagicProperty.Name: Ring of Telekinesis
MagicProperty.Description: While wearing this ring, you can cast the telekinesis spell at will, but you can target only objects that aren't being worn or carried.
